spec: we want to document our API via swagger/openapi. Can we generate the YAML from our endpoints automatically and serve it as an endpoint in both yaml and .js flavours
commitMessage:
Added Swagger/OpenAPI documentation to the API:
- Added @nestjs/swagger and swagger-ui-express packages
- Configured Swagger in main.ts
- Added API documentation decorators to SignupDto and AuthController
- Added endpoints for Swagger UI, YAML and JSON documentation at:
  - /api/docs (Swagger UI)
  - /api/docs-yaml (OpenAPI YAML)
  - /api/docs-json (OpenAPI JSON)
